segments.title: Identification Process Guidelines
segments.summary: Explains guidelines for identification including specific character numbers and arrangements. Discusses taxonomic arrangements and certification requirements for identification.

segments.title: Specimen Identification Methods
segments.summary: Describes how specimens are preserved in textbooks after collection and killing. Explains how birds and animals are preserved in museums for identification purposes.

segments.title: Plant Animal Identification
segments.summary: Discusses methods used for identification of plants and animals, including questions that help narrow down identification to a single specimen.

segments.title: Rules for Identification
segments.summary: Explains how biologists have established certain rules and principles for identification and classification of organisms.
